rows.label: bf11280100_0010
rows.name: So that's how it is.

rows.label: bf11280100_0015
rows.name:
So the hero of the expedition,
the man who pacified the borderlands...

rows.label: bf11280100_0020
rows.name: A Blade going berserk... that's never happened before.

rows.label: bf11280100_0030
rows.name:
It makes sense the Holy See of Acedia
would want to keep this quiet.

rows.label: bf11280100_0040
rows.name:
They're even funneling support to the resistance
through Avaritia to cover their tracks.

rows.label: bf11280100_0050
rows.name: And that's why they came to you.

rows.label: bf11280100_0060
rows.name: I'm the prodigal prince, after all.

rows.label: bf11280100_0070
rows.name:
You won't be able to say that anymore
if you're the one who settles this, right?

rows.label: bf11280100_0080
rows.name:
Give me a break.
Just like you, I have no interest in power.

rows.label: bf11280100_0090
rows.name:
When this is all over,
I'm going to retire and become a farmer.

rows.label: bf11280100_0100
rows.name: Your Majesty!

rows.label: bf11280100_0105
rows.name: The 3rd Ten-Man Squad seems to have returned, but...

rows.label: bf11280100_0110
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: bf11280100_0120
rows.name: They say they saw something strange.

rows.label: bf11280100_0130
rows.name:
A group of rogue mercenaries was moving around,
trying to avoid being seen...

rows.label: bf11280100_0140
rows.name: Rogue mercenaries...

rows.label: bf11280100_0145
rows.name: That is certainly strange.

rows.label: bf11280100_0150
rows.name:
There are no battlefields left to make a profit,
and no villages worth looting around here.

rows.label: bf11280100_0160
rows.name: Following Your Majesty's orders, they avoided engaging,

rows.label: bf11280100_0170
rows.name:
and simply confirmed their
destination before returning.

rows.label: bf11280100_0180
rows.name: I see. So where were they headed?

rows.label: bf11280100_0190
rows.name: The village outskirts...

rows.label: bf11280100_0200
rows.name: The outskirts of the village...

rows.label: bf11280100_0210
rows.name: There was nothing there but the graveyard...

rows.label: bf11280100_0220
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]!

rows.label: bf11280100_0230
rows.name: Shin[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf11280100_0240
rows.name: I see...
